@davidvb

Chill dude, sometimes torrents can get tagged, and if you download it you do actually get a letter from your ISP or the production company itself. NeegroJohnson could be lying but he's probably just trying to warn people, what could he gain from people not downloading someone else's torrent?
The download is slow because there is over 10x's as many Leachers as Seeders, duh.

For those worried about letters from ISP ect on any movie download, install Peer Block, or an older version Peer Guardian2.  I had problems in the past with getting internet shutoff due to downloads, but since installing, not a single issue.  Do a little research, Google will show you the way. or you can download from: http://www.peerblock.com/releases
